item.title: Ben Brubaker
item.description: My latest story in @QuantaMagazine was the most pure unadulterated fun I've had reporting in my time as a journalist to date.After decades, an open online collaboration has definitively identified an unusually active computer program called the fifth busy beaver.1/5

item.title: Noelle :verified:
item.description: "The first step in a fascist movement is the combination under an energetic leader of a number of men who possess more than the average share of leisure, brutality, and stupidity. The next step is to fascinate fools and muzzle the intelligent, by emotional excitement on the one hand and terrorism on the other." ‚Äì Bertrand Russell, Freedom, edited by Ruth Nanda Anshen, Harcourt Brace, 1940.#quotes #reading #politics #SCOTUS #USpol #BertrandRussell #writers #Fascism

item.title: The Guardian :press:
item.description: Germany‚Äôs first Africa-born MP to stand down after racist abuseKaramba Diaby‚Äôs announcement he wants to spend time with family comes after bullet and arson attacks on his officeThe first Africa-born MP to enter the German parliament has announced he will not be standing in next year‚Äôs federal election, weeks after he revealed the hate mail,... #presshttps://www.theguardian.com/world/article/2024/jul/03/germanys-first-africa-born-mp-to-stand-down-after-racist-abuse?utm_source=press.coop

item.title: eliezyer
item.description: We got a used national instruments chassis (PXIe-1071) for Neuropixels recordings that had an extremely noisy cooling fan (85 dB). There wasn't much information online or help from NI figuring out a working quieter replacement. So, I just wanted to spread the word that Noctua cooling fans (NF-A12x25) works like a charm! You'll have to cut off one of the connectors (either NI or Noctua) to put a matching connector, but it runs and cools down the chassis, and I can barely hear the fan spinning üôÇ

item.description: Barcelona has banned Airbnb."The decision is designed to solve what Collboni described as "Barcelona's biggest problem" ‚Äì the housing crisis that has seen residents and workers priced out of the market ‚Äì by returning the 10,000 apartments currently listed as short-term rentals on Airbnb and other platforms into the housing market. item.title: B Kahn
item.description: The NYT asked for reason for canceling. I told them:Coverage of Trump and Biden seems highly biased. 'Biden is too old' gets lots of coverage. 'Trump wants to be a dictator, set up huge detention camps, arrest his enemies, and lies constantly about everything' gets a huge pass. NYT is not the paper it once was and not a paper I care to support any longer. Very sad.

item.title: Carl Zimmer
item.description: On Wednesday the official number of cases in which cows gave people the flu rose to four. Today in my email newsletter, I look back at H5N1's evolutionary trail and imagine its possible paths from here. https://buttondown.email/carlzimmer/archive/fridays-elk-just-when-i-thought-i-was-out/
